name: Buffer Bots
description:
You were paid to take some robots on a remote walk when danger strikes! You must store actions in your robots so they know how to handle their next obstacle! Be the cool, calm robot walker we all know you can be and get the job done! Succeed, or you might end up getting review bombed and lose your job...

Keyboard Controls:

ControlActionSpaceSelectArrow KeysMenu Movement/Robot SelectionAJump BufferSGround Attack BufferDCrouch BufferFClear Buffer


Joystick Controls:

ControlActionStart or Bottom ButtonSelectDpad or Joystick(iffy at best)Menu Movement/Robot SelectionTop ButtonJump BufferRight ButtonGround Attack BufferBottom ButtonCrouch BufferLeft ButtonClear Buffer

Enemies got you baffled on how to handle them? Here's a quick summary of what to do:

  1. If you see a spikey thing on the ground just Jump over it, probably harmless to just leave it there for the next person.
  2. I'm not sure who is leaving all these zappy traps, but somebody's got to turn them off. Give them a good Ground Attack on their button in the front. 
  3. Flying death robots in your hair, getting it all frazzled? Just Crouch under them, they haven't harmed anyone yet. 

Things to note:

  1. This game was made for The Dream Arcade Archive game jam.
  2. The LOCKED levels are not playable by any means. I was unable to complete them by the deadline.
  3. There is one secret in the game that changes how the game is played.
